page.title: 13CHARD MARKET & GUILDHALL
page.content:
Chard Market is held in Boden Street car park on Saturdays and Thursdays. There are more stalls on Saturdays. Some stalls are listed here:jewellery slippers,fruit and vegetables,plants, clothes,bits and pieces,fresh food, meat and milk products,garden equipment,china,electrical goods.
The Guildhall was built in 1835,it is faced with Bath stone.This was cleaned at the end of 1984 in time for the Chard 750 celebrations.It is one of the most imposing buildings in Chard.It juts out over the pavement of the main street. It is also the focal point of many activities in Chard,such as discos;jumble sales;weekly 'antique' sales;art exhibitions;drama productions and it can be hired out for private parties.
